Students volunteer initiative “UVCE Connect”, basically aims at providing students with the facility of question papers and syllabus copy irrespective of any department(s) in UVCE. UVCE connect tries to establish communication among various branches and eliminate the communication lag that exists between them. Important and vital information is made available using cutting edge technology. Users are also provided with the benefit of knowing about various events, organizations and information regarding UVCE. 

UVCE Connect was developed by group of enthusiast students with the ideal purpose of giving back to college. The ideal idea of team helps thousands of students’ to be benefited. 

Vision of developers to involve alumni and provide information in the occasion of Centenary year would directly benefit college in attracting more and more of alumni.
